page.title: 01THE SWIZZELS MATLOWS FACTORY
page.content: New Mills is known to C.B. users as "Toffee Town"because of the big sweet firm.The building is at least four storeys high and there are many windows.In the summer if you go past the factory you can smell a sweet sickly smell of toffees being made.Some children in my class have parents who work there as packers,sweet makers,watchmen,office workers and drivers.Here are examples of the sweets-fruit fizzers,double dips,love hearts,monster fizz, refreshers,strawberry and milk chews. When I think of the factory I imagine all the Umpa Lumpas working away to make sweets just like they do in "Charley and the chocolate factory". by Emma Peel
